extension.summary: Scan videos for Extras folders and add Tags
extension.description: Scans all Movies and TV Shows for specially named Extras folders and adds a Tag to the database. Tagged media can then be easily filtered and Extras can be accessed via the 'Extras' context-menu addon.[CR][CR]Tip: for how to avoid extras beings scraped to library, see http://kodi.wiki/view/Add-on:Extras
